title: Art Fantastique 2
creator: Trek Publications
description: The second issue of an art portfolio featuring some of the greatest artists of the era. Beginning with an exceptionally beautiful cover by Al Williamson & Frazetta, the interior presents black and white illustrations by Frank Frazetta, Reed Crandall, and Wally Wood. Some of this art had been published before. This edition is printed on high quality, heavy art stock. Title: ART FANTASTIQUE 2 Publisher: Trek Publications., Texas, USA Binding: Saddle stitch, 2 staples Illustrators: Frank Frazetta, Al Williamson, Wally Wood, Reed Crandall. Cover Price: $2.50 Print Run: 1500 Publication Date: Circa 1973 Page Count: 36 including covers Publication Size: 8.5 x 11 inches
